Header: Euro 4 replaces Super Diesel and Octane 95
Content: The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation has introduced environmentally friendly Euro 4 petrol and diesel to the market. The Petroleum Corporation said Euro 4 will help engines perform better with less toxic emissions. A ceremony in this respect was held at a filling station in Colombo. It was organized under the patronage of Petroleum Development Minister Arjuna Ranatunge. The current price of a litre of Octane 95 is 148 rupees. A super diesel litre costs 119 rupees. A Euro 4 diesel litre costs 119 rupees while the cost of a litre of Euro 4 petrol is 148 rupees. Accordingly Euro 4 can be purchased at the prevailing prices of Octane 95 petrol and super diesel.
